issue.title: Elide text in status bars and queue status

content.raw: Actually on second thoughts maybe they are just as long how I moved them around. There is still free space in the frequency and amplitude spinboxes. But it's not wasted space now since it doesn't make the box around the 3 subwidgets any larger than it would be if they shrank.
content.html: Actually on second thoughts maybe they are just as long how I moved them around. There is still free space in the frequency and amplitude spinboxes. But it's not wasted space now since it doesn't make the box around the 3 subwidgets any larger than it would be if they shrank.
